post.body: I am enjoying some Christmas music. ;-D How are you doing?
LOL...agreed!
My favorite is the Raspberry White Mocha...mmm mmm good.
Love it! Great food, inexpensive, great selection of beer on tap and heavenly nutter butter cake!
TRUE THAT!!!
NO WAY!!! How bad is it?
Michelle has taught you well.
Phelps is my maiden name. Couldn't you tell by my swimmers physique? Lol
Yea! Will we see you tonight?
Oh no! When will you get home?
A Sharp TV? Is that from Joanna's Christmas list or yours? You didn't cyber bully her into a new tv did you??? LOL
Not that you need Randall's or my approval, but I enjoyed the sermon too. Great look into Joseph's perspective.
Drinking beer while baby sitting? You asked me to be a reference? hmmmmmm..... :)
Is that why you are looking at going to seminary? LOL, love you babe. ;-D
Did you hear Fritz's Bakery is opening a store within 1/2 mile of CLC? Butter cake will be almost within an arm's reach. ;-D LOL
Hey now...play nice...it's Christmas. LOL
So what is up with you and McBuff??? Since you have been home the tweets have been slow. Do we need to send you back to Pittsburgh?
There is no chance of me achieving the level of cory jokester that you have achieved. Why try?
Did you buy a Kirby?!? Does it have dual bags? Uh oh...doghouse time...
@randallmark Thank you Pastor Del...I love it when I am right! HA
Ooooo...a sneak peek. Can't wait to hear the rest. :-)
YEA HONEY!!! That's my nerd. ;-)
True that my friend...true that!
See if Scrooge will let you you put another coal on the fire.
Jen and Aaron are excellent teachers so I was able to pick up on it pretty quickly. I'm sure they would be happy to teach you too.
Super fun card game for 4 people, nice balance of luck & strategy, complicated at first but after a few rounds it is easy to play.
Be careful driving babe. Hopefully the weather will hold out for you. Love you!
Enjoy all of those left over cookies!
Sorry I didn't see this before I talked to you tonight. I hope all is getting better. I will be praying for you.
Why did I go to the mall with my sisters? I am exhausted.
Mmmmm...that was good.
So hungry...come on food...
Waiting for a seat at Miller's Langhorne Ale House...about to bite my ear from boredom!
Check out my Baby's Christmas play, she was the Star of Bethlehem... http://www.vimeo.com/2494262 Thanks for doing the video Ted!
geraldaungst. LOL sorry for the set up, you did well my friend! BTW no family relation that I know of.
Thankful I have Phelps blood running through my veins.
School concert is over, time to backstroke home.
If I had a magic wand, I would help those around me realize how good they have it so there wouldn't be so much complaining!
Loved seeing her baby be the star and her niece being a duck in tonight's Christmas play at church. Sooooooo cute!
Yea!
The Christmas show at the Comcast bldg was really cool, good time.
Checking out the toy train holiday display at Market East. Rachel's face just lit up with excitement.
Whew...we made the train. Randall had to run to make it. Looked like Superman running next to it!
Vacation day...going downtown to Macys Dickens Christmas display, lights, Comcast bldg.
The Mark family is having a hard time getting moving this morning. It looks like a second service Sunday.
Rachel's need for the potty has detoured our trip to Longwood Gardens.
Heading out to Longwood Gardens with the kinfolk. Looking forward to a beautiful evening.
Merry Christmas Everyone!
My honey is the best: http://tinyurl.com/ayhdwn
Here is a great video for all of my male friends. Watch and learn and don't get in the doghouse. http://tinyurl.com/6f2c4w
I assumed this comment was about this coming Sunday since I was wide awake the whole time. I usually catch cool quotes like that too.
What a great small group party. Great friends, silly gift exchange, Turkey Squares and I learned how to play Rook. Life can be so rich!!!
Watching White Christmas with the family and wrapping some Christmas presents. Life is good!
